channel.title: CVE Feed for dholovnia -- Stockists Manager for Woocommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for dholovnia -- Stockists Manager for Woocommerce

item.title: CVE-2022-2518|2024-08-03T00:39:07.946Z -- dholovnia -- stockists%20manager%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Stockists Manager for Woocommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 1.0.2.1. This is due to missing nonce validation on the stockist_settings_main() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to modify the plugin's settings and inject malicious web scripts via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
